game.name: Gaggi Clicker 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Click, collect, upgrade! In Gaggi Clicker, you gather endless Gaggis, boost your production with upgrades, auto-clickers and prestige – and with future updates, even more features are waiting for you!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Click, collect, upgrade! In Gaggi Clicker, you gather endless Gaggis, boost your production with upgrades, auto-clickers and prestige – and with future updates, even more features are waiting for you!
